scripts.lint: npm run package:crypto:lint & npm run app:api:lint & npm run app:dapp:lint
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "CRYPTO,API,DAPP" -c "#86bce3,#f41788,#c8b320" "npm run package:crypto:dev" "npm run app:api:dev" "sleep 20 && npm run app:dapp:dev"
scripts.dev:dapp: package:contracts:build & concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "CRYPTO,API,DAPP" -c "#86bce3,#c8b320" "npm run package:crypto:dev" "npm run app:dapp:dev"
scripts.dev:api: package:contracts:build & concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "CRYPTO,API,DAPP" -c "#86bce3,#f41788" "npm run package:crypto:dev" "sleep 5 && npm run app:api:dev"
scripts.build:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run package:crypto:build && npm run app:api:build
scripts.app:api:dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,NODE,TS" -c "#d531f5,#4d5ffa,#09e3b4" "npm run app:api:dev:watch:babel" "sleep 5 && npm run app:api:dev:watch:nodemon" "sleep 5 && npm run app:api:dev:watch:typings"
scripts.app:api:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rimraf ./apps/api/build && npm run app:api:babel
scripts.app:api:deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rimraf ./apps/api/build && rimraf ./apps/api/x && npm run app:api:babel && mv ./apps/api/live ./apps/api/x && mv ./apps/api/build ./apps/api/live && rimraf ./apps/api/x && openar_api_restart
scripts.app:dapp:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start -w dapp
scripts.app:dapp:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run package:crypto:build && npm run build -w dapp
scripts.app:dapp:deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run package:crypto:build && npm run build -w dapp && openar_dapp_restart
scripts.app:dapp:dev:correct: cross-env PORT=$(grep DEV_DAPP_PORT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_API' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) npm run dev -w dapp
scripts.app:dapp:dev: cross-env PORT=5005 NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 npm run dev -w dapp
scripts.package:contracts:dev: npm run package:contracts:build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TSC" -c "#d531f5" "npm run package:contracts:watch:tsc"
scripts.package:crypto:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run package:contracts:build && rimraf ./packages/crypto/dist && tsc --project ./packages/crypto/tsconfig.json
scripts.package:crypto:dev: npm run package:contracts:build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TSC" -c "#d531f5" "npm run package:crypto:watch:tsc"
